DOC.criteria: Early AMD ( AREDS category 2 ) many small drusen , intermediatesized ( 63124 micrometres diameter ) drusen , macular pigmentary change OR Intermediate AMD ( AREDS category 3 ) extensive intermediate size ( 63124 micrometres diameter ) drusen , least one large ( > 125 micrometer diameter ) drusen geographic atrophy involve foveal centre men woman age ≥50 year BMI 1835 kg/m2 Vision ≥ 20/40 Snellen visual acuity lutein intake < 2 mg/day ( include supplement ) DHA intake < 150 mg/day ( include supplement ) must able give write informed consent normal hematologic parameter normal value plasma albumin normal value liver kidney function use carotenoid , fish oil , n3 fatty acid supplement ( within 1 month study start ) ocular medium opacity ( severe cataract ) history active small bowel disease resection atrophic gastritis history hyperlipidemia screen value follow ( LDL > 5.33mmol/L 205mg/dL ; triglyceride > 4.52mmol/L > 400 mg/dL ) hypertension ( > 150/90 mm Hg ) diabetes mellitus ( also accompany sign diabetic retinopathy ) alcohol intake > 2 drinks/day 14 drinks/week pancreatic disease dementia Alzheimer 's disease anemia , bleed disorder know allergy egg egg product know allergy milk milk product know allergy cocoa chocolate product know allergy fish fish oil lactose intolerance pregnancy lactation diseases interfere fat absorption , e.g . colitis , celiac disease , Crohn 's disease , cystic fibrosis ( determined screen interview ) medication supplement contain significant level carotenoid , include amount lutein 0.25 mg per day within 1 month study start medication interfere fat absorption , e.g . bile sequestrants ( determine screen interview ) use antipsychotic , anti manic , dementia medication smoke use nicotine patch gum ( within past 6 month ) subject extremely high dietary intake carotenoid stroke , head injury loss consciousness seizures US UK center : Non English speaking
